data.sentence: The word إِلَى comes from the root ا ل ي and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to go, go away, depart, take away or go away with, consume, receive, pass along, die, be ended.Opinion, belief, way of action, rite. Hold an opinion, follow the opinion of, hold a belief, adapt an opinion.Gold.
data.sentence: The word ذَهَبَ comes from the root ذ ه ب and is associated with the meanings: to go, go away, depart, take away or go away with, consume, receive, pass along, die, be ended.Opinion, belief, way of action, rite. Hold an opinion, follow the opinion of, hold a belief, adapt an opinion.Gold.

data.meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.
data.sentence: The word أَهْلِهِ comes from the root ا ه ل and is associated with the meanings: possessor/people of, one who recites, superintended/owner, inhabitants/family/people of house or dwelling.

data.meanings: to go or walk haughtily or arrogantly
data.sentence: The word يَتَمَطَّى comes from the root م ط و and is associated with the meanings: to go or walk haughtily or arrogantly
